doc.field: Professional Staff Congress/City University of New York Records
Professional Staff Congress/City University of New York Records
Series I: Records of the United Federation of College Teachers
Series I: Records of the United Federation of College Teachers

Series I: Records of the United Federation of College Teachers, includes Executive Board minutes (1963-1972), files on individual campuses and categories of CUNY employees, correspondence, extensive files on grievances (many arranged alphabetically by name), Negotiating Committee files, mass mailings to members, publicity materials, and material relating to the new York State College and University Council of the American Federation of Teachers.
